plan4dial.generate_files¶

plan4dial.generate_files.convert_yaml(loaded_yaml: Dict) → Dict[source]¶

Generates the JSON configuration required by Hovor from the provided YAML file. First preprocesses the YAML, adding clarification actions, follow-up actions, etc, then finally converts everything into Hovor format.

Args: - loaded_yaml (Dict): The loaded YAML configuration.

Returns: - (Dict): The JSON configuration required by Hovor.

plan4dial.generate_files.make_nlu_file(loaded_yaml: Dict) → Dict[source]¶

Generates the NLU configuration that Rasa requires to extract intents and entities.

Parameters:

loaded_yaml (Dict) – The loaded YAML configuration.

Returns:

The NLU configuration for Rasa.

Return type:

Dict

plan4dial.generate_files.parse_to_pddl(loaded_yaml: Dict) → Tuple[str, str][source]¶

Converts the loaded YAML file to a PDDL specification.

Args: - loaded_yaml (Dict): The loaded YAML configuration.

Returns: - domain (str): The generated PDDL domain. - problem (str): The generated PDDL problem.

plan4dial.generate_files.rollout_config(configuration_data: Dict) → Dict[source]¶

Given the configuration data, generates a PDDL configuration in dict form for ease in calculating applicable actions in conversation rollouts.

Args: - configuration_data (Dict): The configuration data for the domain.

Returns: - (Dict): The PDDL configuration in a dict form.
